articles.title: Guardians fans will ask ‘What if?’ as season ends, but what a great year! – Terry Pluto - cleveland.com
articles.description: As the Guardians lost 5-1 to the Yankees and were eliminated Tuesday in Game 5 of ALDS, some questions will linger.
articles.content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio What if the Guardians hadnt started Aaron Civale ...
What if the Guardians had gotten a few hits in clutch situations ...
What if it hadnt rained ...
